duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect, troubleshoot, and repair various industrial equipment and systems in the West TN / Memphis areas.
Recommend solutions for equipment and systems in line with company policies and customer benefit.
Utilize strong electrical background and controls system experience for troubleshooting and repairs.
Provide high levels of customer service in the field service role.
Adhere to Arch Flash standards and best practices for safety and compliance.

education_certification.credential: BS in Electrical Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Computer Science or Information Technology or technology type degree
